item.title: Info
item.description: Welcome Welcome to Arcane Energy’s website. This post gives an overview of this website and some general information. If you have any questions, you can contact me at my email address. About The following frameworks and systems were used to create this website: Hugo v0.91.2 extended. A modified version of the terminal theme. Embla Carousel to display image carousels. Prism for highlighting code syntax.
item.content:
Welcome

Welcome to Arcane Energy’s website. This post gives an overview of this website and some general information. If you have any questions, you can contact me at my email address.

About

The following frameworks and systems were used to create this website:

  • Hugo v0.91.2 extended.
  • A modified version of the terminal theme.
  • Embla Carousel to display image carousels.
  • Prism for highlighting code syntax.
